attributes.action: Ban Royal Brunei Airlines from operating in UK airport
attributes.additional_details:
Why is this important?

Brunei has just introduced the death penalty for homosexual acts and for adultery. And if that isn’t barbaric enough, it is DEATH BY STONING.

Royal Brunei is a state-owned airline. The Australian Government can send a very clear message to Brunei that gross violations of the UN Declaration of Human Rights can not be tolerated. 
Please take action before the first public executions are held.
